node.title: To verify all changes through the admin panel should reflects to the app.
Login Screen
To verify admin should be able to enter the valid email and password on login fields.
node.preconditions:
1. Internet connection.
2. Supported browser.
3. Enter the customer URL & login with valid credentials.

node.action:
1. Enter the portal URL on the browser search field and enter.
2. Enter the valid credentials.
3. Click on the submit button.
node.expected_result: Admin should be login successfully.

node.title: To verify admin should be login with valid credential and land on dashboard home screen.

node.action:

2. Enter the valid credentials.
3. Click on the submit button.
